definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be guilty (NH id., be under obligation, guilty; Aram. h.ob, [[חוּב]], be defeated, guilty; Ar. xa0ba be disappointed, fail;—Ar. h.uwbun, h.awbun sin, is loan-wd. acc. to Bev Da 1:10);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: not in MT; but rd. perh. [[חַבְתִּי]] (for [[סַבּׂתִי]]) 1Sa 22:22 I am guilty, so SyrVer Th We Dr.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. inculpate [[וְחִיַּבְתֶּם את־ראׁשִׁי לַמֶָּלֶח]] consesc. Da 1:10 and inculpate my head with the king.
